channel.title: Moparisthebest Community Counter Strike: Source GunGame Server
channel.description:
This server is operated by TehSpede, t4, vortex, Aff and cumescape :).
We're running Gungame w/ a few mods (such a healing on a knife kill, quake sounds, noblock, etc)
Come check us out or join the official channel #css on irc.moparisthebest.xxx
Usage of IRC bot in channel: http://gg.gyrat.in/~aleksi/bot.html
Connect via: [size=14pt]gg.gyrat.in[/size] or [size=14pt]css.moparisthebest.com[/size]
[quote="t4"]this game has been around for fucking ever, get it if you don't already have it.[/quote] [quote="Aff"][quote author=Fridder link=topic=530405.msg3872902#msg3872902 date=1325473005] Don't worry, neither have I.
Where do I download it? [/quote]
http://store.steampowered.com/css[/quote]

item.title: Moparisthebest Community Counter Strike: Source GunGame Server
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

(Anthony):

what kind of resources does a CS:S server use, if it’s not too bad i’ll throw one up on my dedi.

t4_ was supposed to set up a gungame server with a bunch of maps/mods i provided him (in a nice tidy list), but he never got around to it

use this to provide a decent prerequisite check if you want to put up a css server

Read full topic

item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:18, topic:427084”]Sounds fun, probably won’t boot up windows to play though. I did have CS:S up and running in WINE but I haven’t checked it to see if it still works for years now.

Oh, and I suck at CS. :)[/quote]

can’t suck more than the bots now (t4 changed the difficulty of them to easy/medium); the server is often empty and it’s normally spede/t4/myself vs bots.

edit: give it a chance and come play with us

Read full topic
